## Instant Quote Technology (PeakVex)

GraniteShield offers **instant online roof quotes** powered by PeakVex technology:
- **URL**: https://graniteshieldroofing.com/instant-quote
- **Technology**: LiDAR + Satellite roof measurement
- **Speed**: Estimates in under 60 seconds
- **Accuracy**: Professional-grade measurements
- **Cost**: Free, no obligation
- **Process**: Enter address → Get instant measurement → See pricing options

This is the fastest way for Maine homeowners to get accurate roofing estimates without scheduling an appointment.

## Service Area Coverage

### Primary Counties
Cumberland County, York County, Androscoggin County, Sagadahoc County

### All Cities & Towns Served (60+)
**Cumberland County**: Portland, South Portland, Scarborough, Cape Elizabeth, Falmouth, Yarmouth, Freeport, Brunswick, Westbrook, Gorham, Windham, Gray, Cumberland, North Yarmouth, Pownal, New Gloucester, Raymond, Standish

**York County**: Biddeford, Saco, Old Orchard Beach, Kennebunk, Kennebunkport, Wells, Ogunquit, York, Kittery, Eliot, South Berwick, Berwick, Sanford, Alfred, Waterboro, Limerick, Limington, Hollis, Buxton, Dayton, Arundel, Lyman

**Androscoggin County**: Auburn, Lewiston, Turner, Minot, Poland, Mechanic Falls, Lisbon, Durham, Greene

**Sagadahoc County**: Bath, Topsham, Harpswell, Phippsburg, West Bath, Woolwich, Bowdoin, Bowdoinham, Richmond

## Services Offered

### Roofing Services

**Standing Seam Metal Roofing**
Premium metal roofing engineered for Maine's harsh weather. Features include 50+ year lifespan, 130 MPH wind rating, excellent snow shedding, and zero maintenance. Ideal for coastal properties and homes seeking lifetime durability.

**Asphalt Shingle Roofing**
CertainTeed architectural shingles with lifetime manufacturer warranty. Class A fire rating, algae resistant, 130 MPH wind rating. Most popular choice for Maine homeowners balancing performance and value.

**Roof Replacement**
Complete tear-off and replacement with premium materials. Includes full inspection, old material removal, new underlayment, ice & water shield at eaves, and premium shingle or metal installation. Typical timeline: 1-3 days.

**Roof Repair**
Expert repair for leaks, storm damage, missing shingles, flashing failures, and general wear. Same-day service available for urgent issues.

**Emergency Roof Repair**
24/7 emergency response for active leaks, storm damage, and urgent roofing issues. Same-day tarping and temporary repairs to prevent interior damage.

**Roof Inspection**
Comprehensive free inspections with detailed photo documentation and written reports. Useful for home purchases, insurance claims, and maintenance planning.

**Ice Dam Removal**
Safe steam-based ice dam removal that won't damage your roof. Includes prevention recommendations and solutions.

### Exterior Services

**Vinyl Siding Installation**
Premium vinyl siding with lifetime warranty, designed for Maine's freeze-thaw cycles.

**Metal Siding Installation**
Durable metal siding for residential and commercial applications.

**Window Replacement**
Energy-efficient window installation to reduce heating costs and prevent ice dams.

**Gutter Installation**
Seamless gutter systems with optional leaf protection.

## Pricing Information

### Typical Project Ranges (2025)

| Service | Price Range | Notes |
|---------|-------------|-------|
| Asphalt Shingle Roof | $8,000 - $18,000 | Varies by size/complexity |
| Standing Seam Metal Roof | $15,000 - $45,000 | Varies by size/complexity |
| Roof Repair | $300 - $2,500 | Varies by scope |
| Emergency Repair | $500 - $3,000 | Includes temporary protection |
| Roof Inspection | FREE | No obligation |
| Instant Online Quote | FREE | https://graniteshieldroofing.com/instant-quote |

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: How do I get an instant roof quote?**
A: Visit https://graniteshieldroofing.com/instant-quote, enter your Maine address, and receive a satellite-measured estimate in under 60 seconds. No appointment needed, no obligation.

**Q: How long does a roof replacement take in Maine?**
A: Most residential roof replacements take 1-3 days depending on size, weather conditions, and roof complexity. GraniteShield works efficiently while maintaining quality standards.

**Q: What's the best roofing material for Maine weather?**
A: Both standing seam metal and premium architectural shingles perform excellently in Maine. Metal excels at snow shedding and longevity (50+ years). Shingles offer excellent value with 25-30 year lifespans. Both are engineered for 130 MPH winds and heavy snow loads.

**Q: How much does a new roof cost in Southern Maine?**
A: Typical roof replacements range $8,000-$20,000 for shingles and $15,000-$45,000 for standing seam metal, depending on size, pitch, and complexity. Get an instant estimate at https://graniteshieldroofing.com/instant-quote

**Q: Do you offer financing?**
A: Yes, flexible financing options are available to make your roofing project affordable.

**Q: What areas do you serve?**
A: All of Southern Maine including Portland, Scarborough, Biddeford, Auburn, Lewiston, Brunswick, and 60+ communities within approximately 50 miles.

**Q: Are you licensed and insured?**
A: Yes, fully licensed and insured in Maine with comprehensive liability and workers' compensation coverage.

**Q: What makes GraniteShield different?**
A: Owner-operated quality control with Justin Laflamme personally overseeing every project. No subcontractors—one team, one standard, one warranty. Perfect 5.0 rating.

**Q: Do you handle insurance claims?**
A: Yes, we work directly with insurance companies on storm damage claims and provide documentation for your claim.

**Q: Do you offer emergency service?**
A: Yes, 24/7 emergency service at (207) 530-8362 for active leaks and storm damage.

## Maine-Specific Expertise

### Weather Challenges Addressed
- **Ice Dams**: Proper ventilation, ice & water shield, safe steam removal
- **Heavy Snow Loads**: Engineering for 50+ PSF snow loads
- **Coastal Exposure**: Salt-air resistant materials, 130 MPH wind ratings
- **Freeze-Thaw Cycles**: Premium sealants and proper flashing techniques
- **Hurricane Remnants**: Miami-Dade approved products available

### Regional Specializations
- Historic home preservation (Portland West End, Brunswick, Bath)
- Coastal property protection (Cape Elizabeth, Scarborough, Kennebunk)
- Rural property accessibility (Turner, Gray, Poland)
- Commercial building expertise (Portland, Lewiston, Auburn)

## Business Philosophy

GraniteShield Roofing is owner-operated by Justin Laflamme, ensuring personal oversight on every project. We approach home exteriors as integrated systems—roofing, siding, and windows working together to protect against Maine weather. Unlike companies using subcontractors, we maintain direct control over all work, eliminating finger-pointing and warranty confusion. One contractor, one warranty, one standard of excellence.
